From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 film by Sean Olson

CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglishBox office$1.1 million[1]
Camp Hideout is a 2023 American coming-of-age comedy film written by Kat Olson, C. Neil Davenport and Dave DeBorde and directed by Sean Olson. It stars Corbin Bleu, Ethan Drew, Amanda Leighton and Christopher Lloyd.[2]


Plot[edit]
This section needs a plot summary. Please add one in your own words. (April 2024) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
Cast[edit]
Corbin Bleu as Jake[2]
Ethan Drew as Noah[3]
Amanda Leighton as Selena[2]
Christopher Lloyd as Falco[2]
Joshua Childs as Willis
Josh Inocalla	as Charlie
Tyler Kowalski as Oliver
Luca Alexander as Trey
Jenna Raine Simmons as Mallory
Zion Wyatt as Chase
Elle Wesley Phoebe
Genesis Juarez as Amy
Tucker Brown as Paulie
Raphael Vittorio Ruggero as Drew
Production[edit]
Filming occurred in Franklin, Tennessee in October 2021.[3]

Release[edit]
In May 2023, it was announced that Roadside Attractions acquired U.S. distribution rights to the film.[2] Camp Hideout was released in theaters on September 15, 2023.[2][4]

Critical response[edit]
On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 40% of five critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 4.8/10.[5]
